xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/330092-Aakasmikam 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nOHTDoOBc6tOHWO1W7pRCnKeCgd.jpg Shwetha Menon is the loving mother, fed up of her drunkard husband (Siddique) who brings home his colleagues to have a peg. Their teenager son gets entangled in a delusional world where he only thinks of things getting worse. He unknowingly takes a big, wrong step & the anxiety created due to that reason makes his life a living hell. Characterization is good & the suspense built is amazing. Details are kept related & is an average afternoon watch. Aakasmikam
